title: High silver or gold team recruitment
body:
Hi guys!

Looking to make a ranked 5's team. 

I am a gold 5 adc main and looking for people to join me, must be able to use voice comms and be active!

leave me some info including role, rank etc or add me in game

ign: earthrune

replies.body: Hey Ign Hashashin currently in low silver but used to be gold earlier in the season, my 3 strongest roles would probably be mid, top , adc though im confident with sup and if i have to. Im pretty active and am able to get any application for voice chat add me if interested

haiii main support main 
can play all supports/lanes
been playing since season two
always active 
g5 currently

Hey Mate,

IGN: Noobasaurus

Role: Jungle (love my tank jungles as you can tell from my most played Sion jungle)

Float around silver.
 
Work from home and Uni online so available most times.

IGN:Wildfire Zyra
Age:28
Main Role:sup/mid/jg
Favourite Champion:thresh,leo,sona,ekko,amumu,warwick,yasuo,cassiopeia
Rank:gold 4
Curse or Skype: team speak? skype
Length of time you could dedicate to the team p/day:3-6
What hours suit you best to play:5-12pm nz time
A bit about yourself and league experience: love lol just need the right team:)
Would you be playing through the day at all ? (12-5pm) Because we are looking for an ADC and top :)

hey i'm interested
ign - zepea
rank - p5
role - i prefer top lane but any lane is fine except supp
normally available on weekends

IGN: Vitrolix
Age: 23
Current Rank: S1 will be back to gold soon
Main Role: Mid
Top Champs: Viktor, Ahri, Azir, Ziggs
Secondary Role: Jungle
Top Champs: Rek'sai, Evelynn, Jarvan, Vi
Have skype, ts, curse voice
